import React,{useState} from 'react'; import './booking.css'; import { Form,FormGroup,ListGroup,ListGroupItem,Button } from 'reactstrap'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Booking = ({tour ,avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews}= tour; const navigate = useNavigate() const[credentials, setCredentials]=useState({ userId:'01', userEmail:'example@gmail.com', fullName:'', phone:'', guestSize:1, bookAt:'' }) const handleChange = e => { setCredentials(prev =>({...prev, [e.target.id]:e.target.value})) }; const serviceFee =10 const totalAmount = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize)+Number(serviceFee) const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault(); nav } return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating ===0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/*================booking form============= */}
Information
{/*==================booking end============ */} {/*================booking bottom=========== */}
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charge
${serviceFee}
Total
${totalAmount}
) } export default Booking
